biotools.summary: This tool provides an extension of the RangedSummarizedExperiment class with additional API features. This new class provides convenient and fast methods for working with segmented genomic data. Additionally, this extension provides the class RleDataFrame which stores runs of data along the genome for multiple samples and provides very fast summaries of arbitrary row sets (regions of the genome).

bioschemas.name: genoset
